org.vngx.jsch.config

Class JSchConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vngx.jsch.config.JSchConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SSHConfigConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SessionConfig

    public class JSchConfig
extends Object
implements SSHConfigConstants

    JSchConfig is a singleton of a global configuration for setting and retrieving vngx-jsch library configuration properties. The configuration defines all the properties which can be set and defines the validators to ensure property values are valid.

    In addition, JSchConfig serves as the parent configuration for all SessionConfig instances, ensuring that any properties not overloaded by the individual session configuration instances use the default global property values.

    Note: This implementation is synchronized and thread-safe.

    Author:
    Michael Laudati

      • getDefinedPropertyNames

        public final NavigableSet<String> getDefinedPropertyNames()

        defined property name set
